CriticalEvents.description: This object is used to represent the critical events.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AcceptedEvents.description: Indicates whether the recipient receives critical events.
AcceptedEvents.longDescription: The value of this property shall be boolean indicating whether the recipient receives critical events.

Enabled.description: Indicates whether the recipient receives critical events.
Enabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be boolean indicating whether the recipient receives critical events.

EnabledAlert.description: This object is used to represent the enabled alert filters.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CriticalEvents.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent enabled critical events.

SystemEvents.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent enabled system events.

WarningEvents.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent enabled warning events.

LenovoAlertRecipient.description: This schema defines the group profiles to be used in conjunction with a manager.
LenovoAlertRecipient.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent resources that represent the group profiles for the manager.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

RecipientSettings.description: This property contains the privilege for this group.
RecipientSettings.longDescription: The value of this property shall be settings for each alert recipient.

RecipientSettings.description: This object is used to represent recipient settings.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Address.description: The address which alert service sends the alerts. The format of this property depends on the value of AlertType.
Address.longDescription: The value of property shall be a string indicating the address which alert service sends the alerts. The format of this property should be email when AlertType is E-mail while the format should be ip:port or hostname:port when AlertType is Syslog.

AlertType.description: Event notification have two types recipient including E-mail and Syslog.
AlertType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be event notification have two types recipient including E-mail and Syslog.

EnabledAlerts.description: Specifies the enabled OOB alerts enabled.
EnabledAlerts.longDescription: The value of this property shall specifies the enabled OOB alerts enabled.

Enabledstate.description: This property contains the user name for the group.
Enabledstate.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the user name for this group.

IncludeEventLog.description: Whether send the event log with the OOB alert.
IncludeEventLog.longDescription: The value of this property indicates whether send the event log with the OOB alert.

RecipientName.longDescription: The value of this property identifies the name of recipient.

SystemEvents.description: This object is used to represent the system events.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AcceptedEvents.description: Indicates whether the recipient receives system events.
AcceptedEvents.longDescription: The value of this property shall be boolean indicating whether the recipient receives system events.

Enabled.description: Indicates whether the recipient receives system events.
Enabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be boolean indicating whether the recipient receives system events.

WarningEvents.description: This object is used to represent the warning events.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AcceptedEvents.description: Indicates whether the recipient receives warning events.
AcceptedEvents.longDescription: The value of this property shall be boolean indicating whether the recipient receives warning events.

Enabled.description: Indicates whether the recipient receives warning events.
Enabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be boolean indicating whether the recipient receives warning events.

title: #LenovoAlertRecipient.v1_0_0.LenovoAlertRecipient
